GET /api/users/:user_id.description: Returns a specified user by their id

POST /api/users.description: Adds a user to the database and returns the added user

DELETE /api/users/:user_id.description: Removes a user from the database

PATCH /api/users/:user_id.description: Updates a users details and returns the updated user

GET /api/wishlist/:user_id.description: Returns a specified users wishlist by their user_id

POST /api/wishlist/:user_id.description: Adds a country to a users wishlist and returns their wishlist

DELETE /api/wishlist/:user_id/:country_n.description: Removes a location from a users wishlist

GET /api/reviews/:country_name.description: Returns a list of reviews for a location

POST /api/reviews/:country_name.description: Adds a review to a location and returns the added review

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: Updates a review by the users id and rerturns the updated review
